meanings.definition: Capable of being supposed or assumed.
meanings.sent1: It is supposable that the missing keys are on the table.
meanings.sent2: In a mystery novel, various supposable suspects keep the readers guessing.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog is supposable in a cartoon world.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as supposable as a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The supposable solution to the puzzle finally clicked in his mind.

meanings.definition: Able to be imagined or considered as a possibility.
meanings.sent1: It is supposable that aliens exist in the vast universe.
meanings.sent2: The supposable outcome of the experiment was eagerly anticipated.
meanings.sent3: The supposable idea of flying cars captured everyone's imagination.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were as supposable as reaching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The supposable success of the project motivated the team to work harder.
